ghost

Class Whim

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.GameObject
      • ghost.Movable
        • ghost.Ghost
          • ghost.Whim

  • public class Whim
extends Ghost
    A type of ghost which pairs itself with a chaser. Once paired with a Chaser, the attack target of Whim in chase mode is determined by the chase vector of Chaser, shifted by 2 units in the direction of Waka's travel, and then extended by twice the length. Its home corner is the bottom right corner. If it does not have a Chaser to pair with, it will directly chase Waka.

    • Method Detail

      • setChaser

        public void setChaser()
        Iterate through the chasers present in the game. If a chaser which has no paired whim is found, the whim pairs itself with a chaser. It then uses the Chaser's attack vector to generate its own.

      • generateVectors

        public int[] generateVectors(int targetx,
                             int targety)
        Generates the vector for which the whim attacks. Its attack vector in chase mode is given by shifting the Chaser's vector by 2 grid spaces in the direction of Waka's travel, and then doubling it.
        Specified by:
        generateVectors in class Ghost
        Parameters:
        targetx - The x coordinate of the target location
        targety - The y coordinagte of the target location
        Returns:
        An array of two integers which is the intended direction of travel for this ghost type.

        public boolean hasChaser()
